text:
="preserve">Jean-François Poron (6 May 1936 – 3 September 2020) was a French actor and director. Poron was born in Paris. He was known for his roles as the Spectator in "The Air of Paris" (1954), as Jakez in "A Captain's Honor" (1982) and as Duke Philip in "Catherine" (1986).
Poron died on 3 September 2020, aged 84.
